Posts.Content: Hi Goldfinch77 When i read the journeys people are going or have gone through  i feel it's not true that i'm going through it too and i have to take deep breaths as i feel i can't breathe. Alot of the time i eat i feel as though i'm going to be physically sick and my stomach churns. I'm lucking as have been caught early, yes i have to have a mastectomy and am having an immediate reconstruction and sentel lymph nodes biopsy. All being well no radiotheraphy needed.   I'm also lucky as have alot of people praying for me. My husband is a fabulous support and is taking time of work from i go in until needed It's all just very overwhelming and scary as you know.  Sorry for the long rant. Gentle Hugs and a Happy Easter to you and your family  sunshine-19
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi Henty I know what you mean as even though my operations not until the 9th May at times i feel as though i can't breathe and have to keep taking deep breaths. Your are probably having panic attacks which can happen its a big thing that is happening your body and you are fearing the unknown. Your surgeon i'm sure has lost count quite some time ago how many times they have preformed these operations . They are highly skilled and will take the horrible disease away then whatever else your getting done. The next thing you will know you will wake up in the recovery ward more than likely thirsty and hungry Just to put you at ease if i can God rest my mum she had a mastectomy a few months before her 85th birthday and she sailed through it. My mum was afraid before but when she came round from Surgery she thought it hadn't  been done yet. My mum never looked back and couldn't believe how easy she got over as she didn't do well with pain.  My mum died last June but, it was due to dementia.  I hope i can be as brave as she was as she was a real Inspiration to others and me. Good night Henty Gentle Hugs being sent to you. Love A x
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi Sophie I hope that you are taking it easy and spoiling yourself. Panicking for nothing my op goes ahead next Thursday and surgeon said she like to do me first.  She said to me i promised you it was still on and i wouldnt let you down. I will just be glad for day to come and have it over x Gentle Hugs Love Angela x
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi Sophie You make sure you take it easy.  No need to apologise for not getting back  to me self care comes first. Try not to over do it as don't  forget its early. It would be nice if you were able to take a bath in epson salts before bed. Thank you for thinking of me. Yes if get the time would love some pampering. Prayers and hugs for yo too Angela x
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi Henty and Janet.  Henty good luck with results next week its  the waiting that's the worst our mind works over time. Janet you must remember you have gone through an awful lot not surprised your emotional. Love and hugs to you both Xx
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi Sophie Lovely to hear from you. Does sound as though you went back too early as you say its all about your emotions and mind. A massive thing has happened to you and it will take time for your energy alone to build back up.  Can understand when you say it feels like you were down a big rabbit hole.  Just take things slowly and give yourself to heal all the different ways. The appointments i have had so far the nurses, consultants and two surgeon have all been fantastic. Infact they are trying to close our breast cancer unit and i went to a meeting in my town and she was at it . She was very discreet and when i spoke with her afterwards in private she was great.  I have to go and see her before my op so im hoping she will ring on Monday.  I may have to wait longer to drive as i already have a problem with my right arm i hoping not though. You look after yourself and i will keep in touch. Love and gentle hugs Angela x
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi Pollydog I'm so glad to hear you have your op over you and doing well with your recovery. Do you mind me asking what type of construction did you have? You have travelled alot today just be careful that your not over doing it.  Sending you Gentle Hugs and I wish you and your family a very Happy Easter. Best wishes sunshine-19
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi Janet Thank you for your lovely message. I''m praying that  i am panicking for nothing    :).  As long as she says its still the same date and not later i will be ok. As far as i know i will be having my mastectomy, sentile lymph nodes removed and reconstruction. Unless anything shows up in lymph nodes i should need nothing else. If i do it will be radiotheraphy. That was lovely of your hairdresser and the fact that he will cut your wig. Im sorry to you have to have chemo.  I could do with a wig anytime as my hair is standing on me every morning lol.  Keep in touch and let me know how you get on. Gentle Hugs Love Angela  X
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi Sophie I think that is great advice that Janet has given you.  After how you felt at the weekend and your emotions etc. I feel it's still early days.   Pampering sounds fabulous  self care is the most important thing. Hugs and sweet dreams Angela  X
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Janet Prayers much appreciated from you too. If i didn't have faith and special peoplr i dont know what i will do. God bless Angela Xx
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi Henty I hope that you are  less anxious about  CT scan etc.  I believe if you havnt already you should contact your BCN and she would all. I hope that you feeling better and drains problems are long gone. How are you feeling in yourself? I am out of hospital from Tuesday went back yesterday to get dressing changed by nurse. Unfortunately had to wait for surgeon as around nipple very red. Have to continue with antiboitic and go back on Tuesday. If gets worse or not clearing may have to get nipple removed. Staying  positive that all will be ok . After being away for so long being prodded then a visitor from a great friend feeling delicate today. Love and hugs Angela x
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi Henty Yes you are right to stay positive. Glad to hear you have the scan over you. Try and do something nice for yourself as you deserve to be pampered or treated. Love and Hugs Angela x
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi Janet I hope your chemo goes ok i understand what you say about the sooner its started the soon its over. I wish you all the best as you go through the next part of your journey. You take it easy until then . Glad to be home be glad when appointment on Tuesday is over . Can't odds what will happen but, waiting is a pain. I have pain under control most of the time.  I am still very tired can't do without nap any day at the moment. Then of course having my fibromyalgia doesnt help as i have lack of energy anyhow. Love and Hugs Xx
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi Henty I'm glad to hear that things are starting to move for you.  Thursday will be here in the blink of an eye. Then operation will be over and then to start recovery or whatever  plans they have told you are next. Mine will be in 3 weeks due to Easter and other ops my surgeon has to do. I've been told no other treatment unless results from op shows anything different. Good luck for next Thursday will be thinking of you. sunshine-19
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Kessy Thank you for replying to me. God bless you with the journey you battled through.  Unfortunately its not that i don't want to eat but, before i do and after my stomach churns. I am already on an antidepressant and it was increased a while back but, i didn't want to take it but, think it a good idea to increase it for a while now. Its really good to you not on your own when you are going through this that you can talk to others that have been or are going through it. It means alot when you know people care. Wishing you a Happy Easter and Gentle Hugs x sunshine-19
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi Sophie I would like my surgeon to ring but not book my appointment to see her until next Monday so i can get my bloods done that day without having to  go back again before op :) . What will be will be in saying all that. Thank you for thinking of me and your love and hugs. Gentle Hugs Love Angela x
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi Sophie So glad you don't have to have Chemo.  Hopefully they will get your bone scan done soon. Maybe they have to wait a while after op before they can start the radio. The fact that you are seeing your physio on Wednesday is good.  Hopefully they will give you tips on how to relieve pains. I will you know tomorrow night how i get on. Hopefully i'm panicking for nothing. Your so thoughtful. I would be lost without this group. Hugs  Love Angela x
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi Sophie I am out of hospital since Tuesday i came home with drain still in . Feeling very tired pain under control. Had to go yesterday to see nurse to get dressing changed. Unfortunately its very red around nipple area so surgeon came after theatre to check it. Have to continue with antibiotic and go  back Tuesday. If it has got worse or not clearing i may have to get nipple removed. I was warned of all this so i can only but, pray this wont be the case. Staying positive though and what  will  be will be. More than enough about me how are you?  Have you any plans for the weekend? I hope you getting pampered as self care is very important in our lives Love and Hugs Angela Xx
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi Sophie Thank you very much for your lovely message.   You never said how you got on at the hospital today yourself. I have to go to the hairdresser in the morning as badly needing done.  Then ive to see my surgeon at 2.45 my first question will be is the surgery going ahead. Thankfully i have calmed down since earlier.  Although i will be glad to get to hospital to get it  all sorted. Thank you for being so lovely it means alot. Big hugs Love Angela X
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi Henty So glad to hear  you are recovering well although sorry to hear the drains are giving you bother. Have you any idea when drains will be taken out?  It's good you have positive attitude. It's still early days so make sure you take it easy and be good to yourself. Gentle Hugs Love Angela xx
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Thank you its lovely  to have support other than family. Good night and take care of yourself xx
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi J   Prayers  are always much appreciated and i love hugs :) your so sweet. Thank you . Prayers for you too and big hugs.  Enjoy your weekend . Best Wishes Angela x
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi  Pollydog No need to apologise you have and are going through a journey of your own . Self care is very important as if you give to everybody else there's nothing left for you, then you can fall ill.  At this time those that you gave to should be helping you. Sorry to hear about you losing your purse etc, I will pray all turns up  You are very strong to have travelled so far on your own. You say your not brave I believe you are and this has made you even stronger..  You had a blip yesterday but that could have happened you any time in life your being hard on yourself. Be proud of yourself  and what you have managed to come through. I'm glad your operation and reconstruction have been such a success and that you are happy with the outcome I was told originally I would only need a lumpectomy and a few lymph nodes removed for biopsy but since core needle was done said from results that it's larger spread than first thought. For this reason I now need a mastectomy and sentnel lymph nodes biopsy.  So that was a massive shock as wasn't really prepared for that outcome. Have come to terms with it now my date for operation and reconstruction on 9th May and how to go and see my surgeon week or so for final measurements etc. Roll on 9th  May hopefully no other treatment she doesn't expect there to be any. As you say just nibble at stuff whatever takes my fancy and drink tea or fluids. My husband and I were away the Monday after diagnosed as it was a Christmas present from him. We went away for 4 days to Santa Pins will had a lovely relaxing time. It just came at the right time :) . Thank you for your lovely message it has been of great help to me.  You have a lovely Easter and I hope you are either spoiled or you spoil yourself. Sending you Gentle Hugs and  God bless you for taking time out to reply Love A
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi Pollydog Thank you for your lovely message. It's so nice to have support from others. I am so glad the  North and the Holy Island worked wonders for you. I'm sure it's good to get the dressing off, have they said how long it will be before you drive? I'm sure you'll be glad to get all your treatment over you.  Then start to recover and get to back to some type of normality. Your friend said she would have them both whipped off but, no disrespect to her you don't know until you have it.  Its a big thing either getting a lumpectomy or a mastectomy  thats why it's such abig shock when you hear it. I will be fine just wish it was over :) .   Thank you for everything. Let me know how your results go and i  will keep in touch and let you know how i get on. Gentle Hugs and best wishes. Im still nibbling :) xx
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi Henty  Just want to wish you all the best for your operation on Thursday. Try and do something nice tomorrow  for yourself and keep yourself busy.  I have already had my pre op. Have to get my bloods done a few days before op and to see my surgeon. She will phone me and tell me when that will be. I will keep you in my prayers. Sending love and Gentle Hugs A xx
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi Sophie I'm so glad to hear that you dont have to get 6 months of chemo and i'm not surprised that you are relieved. Its also good that you will know on a Monday what isxthe next step for you   I'm not so bad at the moment as i know it will soon wind in, yes i know as time gets alot closer i will get very anxious but, i know i will be fine. Not being able to drive for 6 weeks will do my head in lol. In saying that though this horrible thing will be away and for that i will be truly thankful  Please let me know how you get on Monday. I will definitely keep you posted too.  Gentle Hugs Love Angela x
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi  Henty  I hope  that all went well for you yesterday.  No doubt your  uncomfortable and will be for a few days. Take it easy and do the excercise they ask you to do. At least you now know that you are rid of the horrible disease. Good luck in your recovery Gentle Hugs and love being sent your way. A xx
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi Henty I just want you to know that I am thinking of you. Gentle Hugs and prayers being sent your way. Love A xx
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi Sophie Just realised you have an appointment with your oncologist on Monday.  Good luck with it and i hope they get everything moving quickly for you. Take care and please let me how you get on. Love  Angela x
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi  Sophie  I got a phone call from my surgeon secretary to say she wants to see me tomorrow afternoon. On asking could it not be changed to next week as could get my pre op bloods done same day. Saying my operationnis 9th May secretary said date not confirmed yet.   So i tried to get hold of BCN but in clinic. So had to ring BCN office but probably receive no reply until tomorro My aniexty is now going through the roof. Seems like a life time away since i was told it would be 9th May. My head is ready to explod think id go crazy if my date was put back   :( . Sorry for being a whinge  How did you get on with your oncologist today?   Gentle Hugs Love Angela X
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi Everybody I hope all  are doing as well as can be expected. Feeling Anxious and panicking  as Surgeon told me my surgery was penciled in for 9th May.  Her secretary rang today saying shes looking to see me tommorrow i was looking it to be resheduled to next week so could get pre op bloods done same day. Secretary said my surgery date wasnt confirmed as im up to high doe. Unable to get hold of BCN as their doing a clinic.  My heading is busting and  panicking as the thoughts of it being put off is making me feel ill. Sorry for the Whinge but, don't think others would understand why i'm panicking. Enjoy your day folks xx
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi Janet she  hopes mine will be first but wont know until i go in next Thursday at 7.30 i think. She doesnt think i will need any other treatment which will be great. Glad you will be getting things sorted  for chemo. Will keep you in my prayers. Gentle Hugs Love Angela  X
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi Henty I saw my consultant today. She explained every thing to me regarding my DCIS and options for reconstruction.  I am hopefully having my mastectomy on 9th May and reconstruction. Due to my diabetes some of the options are risky and due to not have much fat another option is out. Good luck when you see your Consultant on Thursday if shes anything like the two i seen your come out alot  more knowledgable.  Take care and God bless x
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed terrified. Feel like life is over.

Posts.Content: Hi I am new to this group I am a 60 year old female. On the 20th March I went for a mammogram in our mobile unit, needless to say I have had these before and they have came back normal. So I was shocked on Monday 25th  I was asked  to go to our nearest Macmillan unit for further investigations.  The doctor told me I had calification in my right breast so wanted me to have more test to see if benign or not. I had another mammogram, ct scan and 2 core  biopsies.   I would like to know after people have had these biopsies is it natural to still feel unwell and fatigued by end of 3rd day ?  Also what experiences people have had and the outcome?    I get my results on Thursday which feels like ages away but is only 4 days now. I'm very anxious and would just like to talk to others in a similar situation. Thank you in advance
Posts.Title: Breast Calification

Posts.Content: Thank you Ruby Rose I was reading your battle which hasn't been easy. To be given that news was bad enough but to lose your mum in the middle of it all  must have been devasting. I am so sorry for your loss. I also lost my mum end of last June. Can i ask was it califications that you had too? I'm praying all will be ok and staying as positve as possible.   :) :)   Thank you and Good luck with everything . X
Posts.Title: Breast Calification

Posts.Content: Hi Ruby Rose Thank you  my mum had a long life and wouldn't have wanted her to suffer any more. So shes with my dad whom died 3 1/2 years prior. I love both my mum and dad but, mum  and me shared great memories . Was very close to my family. She was just my wee diamond with a wicked sense of humour :) . When i got my ct scan the woman said there was no lumps in my breast.  What worried me was she also did under arm and said nothing about the lymph nodes.  Probably worrying unnecessarily . I will just pray alls ok. That was lovely that your boys spoiled you. I  got lovely flowers, nicnaks and clothes. Love Angela x
Posts.Title: Breast Calification

Posts.Content: Ruby Rose got my results today. I have DCIS in right breast. Have had pre op and have appiontment with surgeon on 16 April  to discuss op and if i want reconstruction and which type.   Its a terrible shock but alot better than could have been.  Need to go to bed but , its the thoughts of waking up in middle of night and realising this isn't just a bad dream. Good nite x
Posts.Title: Breast Calification

Posts.Content: Hi Grogg I have DCIS have to have breast and 2 lymph nodes removed for biopsy. All being well will need no other treatment.  Staying  positive or head go all together. Still feeling veryy numb massive shock. Take care x
Posts.Title: Breast Calification

Posts.Content: Hi Grogg Yes  im have a mastectomy . Ive been told its a larger than they thought so have to remove breast as only biopsied two bits. They are also taking two lymph nodes for biopsy. Very daunting and so much to take in and decide in such a short space of time.  At this stage just wish it was over   :( Hugs x
Posts.Title: Breast Calification

Posts.Content: Hi Grogg Im very luck to have a small circle of friends and they are great.  They just feel bad that theres not much they can do. Although ive been telling them being theres enough.  They dont try to play it down.  I have found on here great as people are a great support. Thanks Grogg  it means alot xxx
Posts.Title: Breast Calification

Posts.Content: Thanks Grogg for answering my post. Hopefully it's all benign but, i prefer to know both senarios. Xx
Posts.Title: Breast Calification

Posts.Content: Hi TheScriptFan I hope your surgery went well Do you have to get anything else done? Wishing you a quick recovery Takecare   Best wishes x
Posts.Title: Reconstruction using back muscle, anyone else??

Posts.Content: Hi All Ive only  found out Thursday  past that i have DCIS  as they said they were taking biopsies from 2 areas. Although i was told i would only need  that part removed.  Since i was told there was a larger area than they thought so my  right breast has to be removed and two lymph nodes for biopsy.  I am not very big so im not sure what reconstruction to get. I also feel i need to get it same time as op.    I know im lucky as alot people are alot worse but its a big shock as you all know. Hugs x

Posts.Title: Reconstruction using back muscle, anyone else??

Posts.Content: I have to gp to see my Surgeon on Tuesday. Was suppose to be last Tuesday but, my husband had bought me a break of 4 days away as Christmas present so it Coincided. Turned out 4 days away gave me a few days away to take news in which was a massive shock. Was wondering what peoples experience were of recovery and reconstruction? Just think if dont get reconstruction same time as op could be a long waiting list after and not keen on more surgery at a later date.  Just i wantvto know what should ask my surgeon to on Tuesday. Wont know until biopsy of two lymph nodes if will need any other treatment.  With the help of God not! Thank you advance for your help x
